titles.title: To amend the Tariff Act of 1930 to require that certain laminated woven bags be marked with the country of origin.
To amend the Tariff Act of 1930 to require that certain laminated woven bags be marked with the country of origin.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Tariff Act of 1930 to require that certain laminated woven bags be marked with the country of origin.
